attributes.action: Close UK boarders to slow the spread of COVID-19
attributes.additional_details: Temporarily closing the boarders will allow UK residents to feel safe prior to obtaining the vaccine, as well as saving 1000’s of lives.
attributes.background: Consider temporarily closing UK boarder to protect the NHS, save lives and stop the spread of COVID-19. The NHS is currently overwhelmed with victims of COVID-19. New variants emerging are posing an increasing threat to our communities.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/564165
